collection:
This Privacy Policy informs you
about how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use
our services or interact with us.

Personal Data we collect

When you use our services or interact with us, we only collect the following
personal data from you: Your Email address.

If you log in using your Notion
Account, we process your corresponding Notion Account Email Address and save
an access token to perform actions like inserting databases into your
workspace when you use these parts of our services.

We collect this
information directly from you when you sign up for our service.
sharing:
Sharing your personal Data

We do not share your personal data with any third parties, except as required
by law or with your explicit consent.
